Number of places available: 2 full year places

CUHK- Shenzhen Incoming exchange website

General Contact: oalinbound@cuhk.edu.cn

Dates

Term Dates:

ChineseU HK Shenzhen term dates

Application deadlines (once allocated a Global Opportunities place by Durham):

Fall Term (September): 8 May

Spring Term (January): 8 October

Academic Information

Course Choice

CUHK-Shenzhen provides courses across the following Schools and Programmes

School of Science and Engineering

Mathematics and Applied Mathematics

New Energy Science & Engineering

Electronic Information for Engineering

Financial Engineering

School of Management and Economics

Marketing and Communication

Global Business Studies

Economic

School of Data Science

Computer Science and Engineering

Statistics

Data Science and Big Data Technology

Financial Engineering (Quantitative Finance, FinTech)

School of Humanities and Social Science

Translation

Applied Psychology

English Studies

School of Life and Health Sciences (LHS)

Bioinformatics

Biomedical Science and Engineering

Pharmaceutical Science

Module List: AY2023-2024_UG - OneDrive (sharepoint.com)

Study Load

CUHK-Shenzhen uses a credit unit system. Criteria of assessment may include any one or a combination of the following: attendance, class work, written work, laboratory work, fieldwork, research papers, tests, examinations, and/or any other assessment.

The students shall take-

minimum: 9 units per term

maximum: 18 units per term

For more information, please visit: Academics | 学术交流处 (cuhk.edu.cn)

Admission Requirements

Undergraduate students should have completed at least two academic terms of university studies.

Grade point average (GPA) of at least 3.0 on a 4.0 scale (B average or above, or equivalent).

No prior study of the Chinese language or Chinese / Asian studies is required.

Accommodation

CUHK-Shenzhen adopts a collegiate system. Colleges are social communities with their own dormitories, dining halls, gyms, music studio, dance room and other facilities. All students will be assigned to different colleges so that students with different academic and cultural backgrounds will enjoy close interaction with teachers and grow up with peers at colleges. A tutor will be arranged in each floor and a warden in each block for caring students. On-campus accommodation is available to incoming exchange/visiting students but cannot be guaranteed due to limited capacities.

Room Type

4-bed dormitory, shared bathroom

Fees & Expenses

Housing

CNY600/student/term

CNY1,200/student/academic year

Daily Cost

Approximately CNY3,000/month to meet living expenses such as food, books, sports.
